name: Flock (arthurshim)
description:
Flock is a game where your survival depends on your flock. In each level, you must build your flock to the target size. Watch out for enemies! They lurk around and will shoot you if they see you. Your flock is your sword and shield; you can fire your flockmates at enemies and as long as you have a flock, you cannot die. 

The AI in this game was implemented using 2D flocking behavior.

Created by Arthur Shim for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Music:
